item.title: Mech Arena Promo Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Mech Arena is a dynamic multiplayer shooter for mobile devices in which you can experience an unforgettable experience of controlling a mech. Having chosen a large robot and equipped it with parts and weapons, you can go to one of the game modes to test your skills and earn currency to buy something more powerful. Victories bring tons of valuable currency rewards and even cases, but if you want to get something for free, use Mech Arena promo codes.

Using codes, you can get in-game currency, components for your mechs, or other stuff. However, codes have a limited expiration date, so you should use them as soon as possible.

Updated April 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active Mech Arena codes available right now, each offering different rewards like A-coins, Credits, weapons, and even Mechs. Some of the rewards are aimed specifically at new players, so it’s a good time to start if you’re new to the game. Be sure to use the codes while they’re active, as they can expire without warning. We’ll continue updating this guide with any new rewards, so it’s worth checking back often.

All Mech Arena Codes

Working Mech Arena Codes

  • ILOVEMIDGAME - Enter this code to get Rank 4 Nade launcher 6 and 100 A-сoins. (NEW) (Only for New Players)
  • MIDTENGUGIFT - Enter this code to get Rank 3 Tengu and 100 A-сoins. (NEW) (Only for New Players)
  • MIDGAME - Enter this code to get Rank 3 Guardian. (NEW) (Only for New Players)
  • GGTBONUS - Enter this code to get Rank 3 Javelin Rack 8. (NEW) (Only for New Players)
  • BLASTZONE - Enter this code to get the Guardian and 50k Credits. (NEW) (Only for New Players)
  • LUCKYSHOT - Enter this code to get the Legendary Slingshot, Slingshot Skin,150 A-coins, and 50k Credits. (NEW)
  • MIDGAMEGIFT - Enter this code to get the 200 A-coins and Credits.
  • MIDGAMER - Enter this code to get the Prodigy Crate.

Expired Mech Arena Codes

  • HOLIDAYMECH - Enter this code to get the 300 A-coins, 100k Credits, an Amateur Crate, and the Legendary skin Slay Ride for Killshot.
  • SPOOKYSHOT - Enter this code to get the Epic Skins.
  • mech3years - Enter this code to get the Golden Age Epic Skin.
  • FIREPOWER - Enter this code to get the rare weapon Rocket Mortar 10.
  • CHAMPION - Enter this code to get the Skin.

While you can get all the best parts and weapons for your mechs by just playing the game, sometimes there's nothing better than a little freebie. Of course, you will not get super powerful items using the codes, but you can get a decent weapon or some money to buy new items quite early on. After all, replenishing your hangar with new components is one of every player's main goals, allowing you to diversify the gameplay significantly. However, reward codes have a limited expiration date, so hurry up and get all of them.

How to Redeem Mech Arena Codes

Unlike in many mobile games, the ability to redeem codes in Mech Arena is available from the first seconds of the gameplay. To do this, you need to copy the active code and follow these steps:

  • Launch Mech Arena .
  • Once in the main menu, click on the envelope icon at the top of the screen to go to the Mail tab.
  • Go to the Promo Code tab.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Promo Code text box.
  • Click Confirm, and you will receive your rewards.

How to Get More Mech Arena Codes

As with most other free mobile games, you can find more Mech Arena promo codes during events and holidays or as a regular promotional reward created to increase popularity. You can find a list of all new codes by checking our guide periodically. However, if you want to keep abreast of all the in-game news, you can follow the official developer pages:

  • Discord
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • YouTube

Mech Arena is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Hunting Sniper Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Hunting Sniper is one of the representatives of hunting simulator games. In it, players will have to compete in hunting various animals. But it is not enough to just hit the target, as you also have to hit vital points to earn more points and win. To do this, you will need to use various weapons, which can be obtained using Hunting Sniper codes.

These codes will reward you with various useful items, such as Gems. Moreover, some of them contain rare Chests from which new rifles drop.

Updated April 26, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code has arrived, giving you even more Gems to boost your progress in Hunting Sniper . Along with other active codes, it’s a good opportunity to pick up valuable rewards and improve your experience. More freebies could be added later, so it’s a good idea to keep this guide saved. We’ll continue updating it with any new codes that come out.

All Hunting Sniper Codes

Working Hunting Sniper Codes

  • EASTERBANG - Redeem this code to get Gems (NEW)
  • deerhunter - Redeem this code to get a Legendary Chest
  • followcommunity - Redeem this code to get 300 Gems

Expired Hunting Sniper Codes

  • CRACKSOON
  • DREAMSHOT
  • WILDFRIEND
  • DOUBLETWELVE
  • WINTERHUNT
  • HUNTERSGIVING
  • perfectkill
  • Animalfriend
  • Happyanniversary
  • restandplay
  • Purrfectday
  • Funemoji

During the hunt in Hunting Sniper , players manually aim before each shot. But if, in the early stages, it is not difficult to hit the target, then the further you move along the leaderboard, the more difficult the challenges will be. And to win there, you will need to change the weapon to a more powerful one. To do this, players can open Chests or use Hunting Sniper codes.

Each of them will reward you with various free goodies, including the desired Chests of various rarities with new weapons. However, the codes are valid for a limited time, after which they expire and the rewards become unavailable. So, you should redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Hunting Sniper Codes

Using codes in Hunting Sniper is as easy as in other mobile simulators. Players just need to make a few taps:

  • First, launch Hunting Sniper .
  • After that, click on the button with three stripes in the upper right corner of the screen and go to Settings.
  • Then select the Game tab and tap on the Redemption Code button.
  • Next, enter the code and click Redeem to get your well-deserved goodies.

It is important to note that Hunting Sniper is case-sensitive, so you should be more careful when entering each code. For convenience, we recommend that you copy and paste them from our list.

How to Get More Hunting Sniper Codes

If you do not want to miss more Hunting Sniper codes, we recommend that you visit the developer's pages. Just like with most other free mobile games, there they post all the latest news about the game, including codes.

  • Hunting Sniper Facebook page
  • HuntingSniperGame X page
  • Official Hunting Sniper page

Hunting Sniper is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Oblivion Remastered: Best Armor Enchantments, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Enchanting is key in Oblivion Remastered for enhancing weapons and armor with magical properties for any character build.
  • To access enchanting altars, players must join the mages' guild, complete quests, or acquire Frostcrag Spire.
  • Best armor enchantments include Water Breathing, Feather, Fortify Attribute, and Elemental/Magic Resistances.

The Oblivion Remastered surprise announcement may not have been quite as surprising as intended, but that's done nothing to dampen the excitement of fans of the classic Elder Scrolls game. The remaster is a delightful mix of old and new, with a gorgeous new look powered by Unreal Engine 5, and some tweaked design in terms of leveling, combat, and traversal. Even with all those changes, the remaster remains faithful to the original release, with all the same content, voice acting, and characters that fans know and love.

One of the best ways to get the most out of all the loot players will find in Oblivion Remastered is Enchanting. This skill allows players to add magical properties to both weapons and armor. Players can use any magical effect they know to enchant their gear, which means enchantment can help compliment any character build with the right additions.

There are a few steps for players to be able to access the enchanting altars needed to start creating their own enchantments though. The Hero can either join the mages' guild and complete a number of quests, or acquire the player home Frostcrag Spire and activate the altars within with the Magetallow Candle Box. Alternatively, players can pursue closing the Oblivion gates and use Sigil Stones to enchant fixed effects to their gear based on the stone type and rarity. Either way, it's best to know what enchantments players want before committing the time and effort. These are some of the best armor enchantments in Oblivion Remastered .

8 Water Breathing

Expert Swimmer

Water Breathing is a useful effect to have on a piece of gear, especially if it's something easy to carry around like a ring or amulet. It only comes in handy when the player has to explore underwater in caves or to complete specific quests, but when those situations arise, slipping on a ring is much easier than recasting the Waterbreathing spell multiple times.

7 Feather

Increased Carry Weight

If players want to carry around alternative weapons, or haul a significant amount of loot back to a merchant, they're going to need some extra carry weight. An easy way to get this for characters who aren't investing in strength is to use a Feather spell. Putting the Feather effect onto a piece of gear will give a permanent buff to carry weight, letting players carry heavier gear or horde more treasure.

6 Spell Absorption

Mana Generator

Spell Absorption can help destruction mages keep slinging spells when they're facing off against another mage. This spell effect absorbs magicka from any spells that hit the wearer. It doesn't reduce the damage that the spell deals, but it does help casters keep up their offense without the use of potions. As with other effects, players will need to know an Absorption spell before they can enchant it.

5 Fortify Attribute

Play To Your Strengths

Fortify Attribute is a versatile effect that any character can use to buff their main stats. The effect can enchant any main attribute (Strength, Intelligence, Speed, Endurance, etc.) onto a piece of gear for a permanent buff while players wear it. This can be used to buff a major attribute even higher, or make up for a deficit in a particularly low main stat.

The attribute buff from an enchantment made with a decent-sized soul gem is well worth having, though this is a costly skill to enchant in terms of gold needed. On the plus side, if players know any Fortify Attribute spell, no matter how small, they can then enchant any attribute onto a piece of gear.

4 Elemental / Magic Resistances

Spell-Proof

When players start fighting higher-level casters in Oblivion Remastered, higher-level spells can do a lot of damage. Players can mitigate this by enchanting resistances onto their gear. There are resistances for each element, as well as blanket resistance to magic damage. Players will be able to enchant a single element's resistance higher than the cover-all magic resistance, proportional to the soul gem used. That means it's possible to either go for specific gear for specific resistances, or try and go for balanced resistances on one set.

3 Chameleon

Stealthy Approach

For players who want to take a stealthy approach, whether that's for thievery or sneak attacks, the Chameleon spell can make a big difference. Combined with a high sneak skill, a Chameleon spell with a decent percentage can make players very difficult for enemies to see. That makes it easy to pilfer goods from merchants, or pick off enemies with a bow from stealth. Using Chameleon as an enchantment is a way of permanently augmenting a player's sneaking while they're wearing the gear.

2 Shield

Physical Resistance

Wearing armor lowers the effectiveness of spellcasting in Oblivion Remastered , and the heavier the armor, the bigger the penalty. That means that players who want to focus on magic may choose to wear enchanted robes instead. That leaves them very vulnerable to physical attackers, though. The Shield spell from the Alteration school can help mitigate this, providing percentage-based physical damage reduction. Enchanting this onto spellcaster gear can be a way to get the positive effects of wearing armor, without the negatives for a caster.

1 Reflect Spell

Revenge Damage

The Reflect Spell can be a powerful effect for melee warriors, as this will send back a portion of the damage when they get peppered with spells from range. When players are dealing with ranged caster enemies, it's almost certain they'll take a few spells to the face as they close the gap. Enchanting the Reflect spell effect onto a player's gear is a way to whittle down casters with their own damage, leaving them easily finished off when players get into melee range.

Players need to bear in mind that Enchantment doesn't have its own skill in Oblivion Remastered , so what they can enchant is based off their knowledge of spells, as long as they have the skill to use them. Cost scales with the power of effects, so powerful enchantments like this need a lot of gold, a powerful soul gem, and the skill to use the spell.

6 Images
6 Images

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Best Dice (& How To Use Them)
item.description:
Playing dice is a fun mini-game in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 that can also earn players some coin. However, without the right dice, players may find winning difficult . This is especially true if they're playing against dice players who have loaded dice.

Henry will encounter dozens of dice players as he travels through Trosky and Kuttenberg in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 . Some of those players come ready to the game with dice that are loaded in their favor. They'll be making huge moves while players with standard dice will have a hard time beating them .

Thankfully, players can get their hands on loaded dice, too. There are tons of different dice out in the world to buy or find, but these are the best dice in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 that players should focus on getting as soon as possible.

The Best Dice in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 According To Weight

Each dice in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 has a specific weight on each side. That weight can impact the chances of which side ends up rolling on the face side. The best number to roll in Farkle is one, since it scores 100 points .

Getting three ones in a single roll can earn a player 1,000 points , so it's vital to find dice that will give players the highest chance of rolling a one. The top six dice with the best weights for rolling ones are as follows:

Dice Name:

Percent Change To Roll 1

Weighted Die:

66.7%

Pie Die:

46.2%

Heavenly Kingdom Die:

36.8%

Favourable Die:

33.3%

Aranka's Die:

28.6%

Lucky Die:

27.3%

The ideal setup here is to have six Weighted Dice . With a 66.7% chance of rolling a one, players will stack the odds of rolling 1,000 points in their favor. Even if players can't get a bunch of Weighted Dice, they can still fill their six-dice set with these other dice to further improve their chances .

Some of these die, like Aranka's Die , can only be obtained once through a quest. Others, like the Heavenly Kingdom Die, players can pickpocket from NPCs like Cook Fanka and Guard Hynek .

One area where players can get the Weighted Die is inside the bandit chest at the campsite near Rockwater Pond . The bandits are in the same location where Henry and company got jumped at the beginning of the game.

The Best Dice in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 For Strategy

While players can certainly look for the best dice in terms of weight, there are three other dice that players should consider getting for the best strategy. These dice are the following:

  • Devil's Head Die
  • Saint Antiochus Die
  • Lu, Ci, Fer Die

The Devil's Head Die is a great choice because it has a unique face that acts like a Joker . Whenever the Devil's Head appears, players can use it to act as any number they want. For example, using this die with one of the Weighted Dice listed above can help increase the chances of getting 1,000 points .

The Devil's Head Die only works when the Devil's Head is the side that's rolled. Otherwise, all the other numbers act as normal . It's that Joker, though, that can turn a boring roll of two ones into a game-changing roll of three ones.

The Lu, Ci, and Fer Dice are a special type of dice known as the " demonic dice ." Besides sounding cool, they're another set of dice that are also very useful. Each of these dice is weighted so that they have a higher chance of rolling on the six side .

If players can get all three, or even multiple Lu, Ci, and Fer Dice, they have a high chance of rolling several sixes and scoring anywhere from 600 points to 1200 points , and so on. It's not guaranteed that they'll always land on six, however, so players will want to use them with caution.

The Lu, Ci, and Fer die spell out LuCiFer when combined. Since they all are weighted to roll sixes, it's possible to get 6-6-6 from them, hence the demonic number.

Finally, players should especially try and get their hands on as many Saint Antiochus Dice as possible. The Saint Antiochus Dice always roll a three . While that may seem like a small number, that's only if players don't have an entire dice set of Saint Antiochus.

The strategy here is to roll all threes. When players do so, they're able to keep rolling their dice over and over and over until they have enough points to win. Henry can basically win any dice game in a single round by using a full set of Saint Antiochus Dice.

Depending on the player's strategy, there are quite a few dice out there in Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 that can offer different strategies and different ways to win.

12 Images
12 Images

item.title: The Outer Worlds 2 Returning Characters Wish List
item.description:
This article contains spoilers for The Outer Worlds .

When the first teaser for The Outer Worlds 2 dropped in June 2021, it came with the tagline: “New star system. New crew. Same Outer Worlds.” Since then, Obsidian Entertainment has been fairly mum about where the anticipated sequel will take place. The most that fans have been told is that it will take place in the Arcadia Star System, according to the Steam description for The Outer Worlds 2 . This means that players will be leaving Halcyon behind and embarking on a brand-new adventure.

That’s not to say that the characters of the first The Outer Worlds will be completely off the cards, but it is likely that most of the characters players met in the first game will not be returning. However, since this is a game all about space exploration enabled by faster-than-light technology and the reach of different mega-corporations across the stars, fans may get to meet some of their old friends and foes from The Outer Worlds – although this time around, it will be in a completely different time, place, and person.

Characters Who Could Make a Comeback in The Outer Worlds 2

  • Lilya Hagen
  • Junlei Tennyson
  • SAM
  • Ellie Fenhill
  • Martin Callahan

Lilya Hagen

Lilya Hagen is the CEO of the Sublight Salvage & Shipping company, with her headquarters aboard the Groundbreaker. Lilya’s company is infamous for its black-market dealings, described as a salvaging network with “transportation” and “waste disposal” services. The Groundbreaker is the one thing in Halcyon that isn’t tied down by the forces of gravity – especially true depending on which The Outer Worlds ending players choose – so it’s entirely possible that fans will see Lilya and other Groundbreaker characters return for the sequel.

Junlei Tennyson

There can’t be a conversation about the Groundbreaker without mentioning its chief engineer. Most of Junlei’s missions in The Outer Worlds revolved around helping her fix the Groundbreaker’s systems and clearing out undesirables from its depths. Junlei was also the subject of a rather charming romance quest involving Parvati, one of the player’s beloved companions.

SAM

Short for “Sanitation Automechanical Maintenance,” SAM is a mass-produced sanitation robot-turned-weapon that spews pre-programmed corporate slogans in lieu of true artificial intelligence. It can be a devastating The Outer Worlds companion capable of tanking and dealing serious damage. Depending on how widespread these units are, it would not be out of the question for SAM – at least, a SAM – to make an appearance somewhere in Arcadia.

Ellie Fenhill

Ellie is one of the rare The Outer Worlds characters to survive regardless of the player's choices. A trained doctor, trust-fund baby, and poser privateer, Ellie's ending is left with one of two outcomes, both of which leave her on the Groundbreaker. In one of those endings, she eventually gets her own ship and heads off on her own adventure. It's possible that her adventure will take her somewhere in the Arcadia system.

Martin Callahan

Another character so beloved that some The Outer Worlds players wish they could romance him, Martin Callahan is the face of Spacer’s Choice aboard the Groundbreaker. This is literal, as Martin wears the Spacer’s Choice Moon Man head so often that, with enough poking and prodding, he will dryly say, “I think it’s part of me now.” Even if players don’t get to see Martin again, it would be nice to see at least one character who nods to the unofficial mascot of the franchise.

Bonus: Auntie Cleo

Though not seen in the flesh in The Outer Worlds , Auntie Cleo's presence was felt throughout the game, and it seems she is slated to have a much larger role in the sequel. In The Outer Worlds 2' s first gameplay trailer, it is shown that Auntie Cleo has bought out her rival competitors, Spacer's Choice and Rizzo's, which are now called Auntie's Choice Co. and Fizzo's, with posters of the latter bearing her likeness. She was also the antagonist of the Outer Worlds episode of Amazon's Secret Level .
